body:
School abjuration

Level alchemist 5, cleric 5, inquisitor 5, sorcerer/wizard 6, summoner 6

Duration 1 minute/level

Saving Throw Will negates (harmless)

Spell Resistance yes (harmless)

Target Restrictions selected

The target of a wordspell with this effect word gains spell resistance equal to 12 + the caster's level.
name: Resist Arcana
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Dispelling Words/Resist Arcana
